name: Microcosm (itch)
description:
Microcosm is a minimalist game about looking through a microscope.

I originally made this for 0hgame, but decided to take a few extra days and polish it up/make it more playable. I like the concept, so I may start working on it again later.

To play, simply click to move.

Music by Inemuri. Headphones recommended.

---------

Two versions are available - the Fast version uses a simpler set of shaders which will work better (and still look great!) on integrated graphics cards and older hardware. The Pretty version is significantly heavier and recommended for use with dedicated graphics cards.

In addition, the original 0hgame submission is available below, but it doesn't play nearly as well.
